channel.title: Automatically minimising at random intervals.
channel.description:
So basically, when I'm playing it, everything performs great until for some unknown reason, the window minimises itself. So I tried to see if playing it in windowed mode would prevent this. It didn't work.
If anyone has had the same issue please help me out here.
My specs are: Windows 7 (64-Bit) 8GB RAM AMD Bulldozer Hexcore Processor ATI HD6850 1GB Graphics Card
Any and all help is appreciated.

item.title: Automatically minimising at random intervals.
item.dc:creator: robbieman456
item.description:
Thanks for the help guys but, now it automatically closes the application whenever I try to launch it. I didn’t change anything and I made multiple attempts at it but it was the same result everytime. So I reinstalled it and restarted the computer. Still doesn’t work. I have no idea what I’m doing wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Automatically minimising at random intervals.
item.dc:creator: RiscIt
item.description:
Some antivirus scanners will do that when they update.

Read full topic

item.title: Automatically minimising at random intervals.
item.dc:creator: redwes
item.description:
You’re probably just accidentally triggering the black “SYSTEM INFORMATION” window. That window has a pesky shortcut that I always seem to find.

Read full topic
